title: The No.9 B Utopia by David Bramwell (.epub)
description:
The No.9 Bus to Utopia: How one man's extraordinary journey led to a quiet revolution by David Bramwell

Requirements: .ePUB reader

Overview: When David Bramwell’s girlfriend left him for someone she described as 'younger, but more mature than you', he decided he had something to learn about giving. Taking a year off, he journeyed through Europe and America seeking out extraordinary communities that could teach him how to share. He wanted answers to a few troubling questions: Is modern life rubbish? Why do so many of us feel lonely and unfulfilled despite a high standard of living? Are there communities out there who hold the key to happiness? And if so, why do so many of their inhabitants insist on dressing in tie-dye?

Genre: Non-Fiction > Health, Fitness & Medical
